title: Ticket #6818: change submit keyword from materialize_max_idle to max_idle
description: prior to documenting late materialization, we should change condor_submit to accept max_idle as the keyword to enable late materialization rather than materialize_max_idle. For backward compatibility, the old keyword will also be permitted.
check_ins: 2018-Nov-09 11:06   Check-in [55698]: for #6818, use max_idle in preference to materialize_max_idle in submit files. ===VersionHistory:none=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
